channel.title: Help is appriaciated. magic bow spec/ pots/ pickup/ runecraft/ ancient teles
channel.description:
NEED HELP STILL.
hiyascape is my original base. =[ 1) adding working ancient teleports to my server 2) adding snare and bind to my server 3) adding the runecraft thing like on ric's 4) adding a magic bow spec + working crossbows 5) cleaning up my client.java 6) working str pots. 7) making czar pickup 5 digits.

item.title: Help is appriaciated. magic bow spec/ pots/ pickup/ runecraft/ ancient teles
item.dc:creator: @t0_g0od_t0_k0 t0 g0od t0 k0
item.description:
@t0_g0od_t0_k0 wrote:

for the rune cbow fix

searth for if (playerEquiqment[playerWeapon] *****) // rune crossbow
{
return 427;
}

the ***** cuz idk whats axactly there
change the ***** to 13800
en change the return 427 to return 426; otherwise u will have a idiot emote
save and compile then run

Read full topic

item.title: Help is appriaciated. magic bow spec/ pots/ pickup/ runecraft/ ancient teles
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

  1. Enable it?
  2. Just look at ice barrage castonplayer and use all that for snare\bind just with different gfx
  3. I don’t know anything about ric’s server
  4. Forgot how to do this but just put usebow method and put specials on it like the other specials. For crossbows, just copy the usebow method for npcs and pking, call it usecrossbow and change the animations etc
  5. …Make handlers? no one is going to do everything for you
  6. Again, enable them
  7. Czar already does… like pickup 00995 999999

I don’t usually give straight out answers, I just help

Read full topic
